purpose: To provide resources and examples for building applications using large language models with LangChain.
principle: Leverages LangChain to integrate various large language models like ChatGPT and Claude for application development.
reusability: Includes reusable code snippets and examples that can be adapted for different LLM applications; supports integration with multiple LLMs.
limitations: Primarily serves as an educational resource; may require adaptation for production use cases.
name: generative_ai_with_langchain
description: Build large language model (LLM) apps with Python, ChatGPT and other models. This is the companion repository for the book on generative AI with LangChain.
highlight: Companion repository for a book on building LLM applications with LangChain, offering practical examples and insights.
